pages.text: Stinky tofu can be made by soaking tofu in the brine. As its name suggests, they have a strong odor that can be smelled even from far away. Eating stinky tofu restores 2 hunger, and gives the consumer 1 minute of $(c)Stinky$() effect. When a player has stinky effect, most mobs will try to run away from you, even when they are hostile toward you.
